meals.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat the fat.
Brown the onion.
Add in the curry powder, chilli powder, salt, and stir.
Fry until golden brown.

meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
In a separate pan, sauté the garlic and onion in olive oil.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Cut the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
In a wok or pan, heat sesame oil and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Season with soy sauce and serve hot.

meals.name: Beef Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice the beef into thin strips.
In a wok or pan, heat sesame oil and sauté garlic.
Add the beef and stir-fry until cooked.
Add the vegetables and continue to stir-fry until tender.
Season with soy sauce and serve hot.

meals.name: Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
instructions: Season the salmon fillets with salt and black pepper.
In a pan, melt the butter and sauté garlic.
Add lemon juice and parsley to the butter.
Pan-fry the salmon fillets until cooked through.
Serve with the lemon butter sauce.

meals.name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: In a pan, sauté garlic and onion in butter.
Add the arborio rice and cook until lightly toasted.
Add white wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring until rice is creamy.
Stir in mushrooms, parsley, and Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve the mushroom risotto hot.

meals.name: Grilled Vegetables
instructions: Slice the vegetables into thick slices.
In a bowl, mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic, and chopped basil.
Marinate the vegetables in the mixture.
Grill the vegetables until tender and lightly charred.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve the grilled vegetables as a side dish.
